mapper.select: SELECT ISBN, REVIEW_NUM, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REVIEW_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YY/MM/DD') REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NUM = #{reviewNum} AND ISBN = #{isbn}

SELECT REVIEW.ISBN, REVIEW.REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW.REVIEW_CONT, REVIEW.REVIEW_POINT, REVIEW.MEMBER_ID, REVIEW.REVIEW_NUM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REVIEW_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YY/MM/DD') REVIEW_DATE, BOOK.ISBN, BOOK.BOOK_TITLE FROM BOOK JOIN REVIEW ON BOOK.ISBN = REVIEW.ISBN WHERE REVIEW.ISBN=#{isbn} ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(REVIEW_NUM), 0) + 1 FROM REVIEW
INSERT INTO REVIEW (ISBN, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONT, REVIEW_POINT, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_NUM, REVIEW_DATE) VALUES (${isbn}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewCont}, #{reviewPoint}, #{memberId}, #{reviewNum}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_TITLE=#{reviewTitle}, REVIEW_CONT=#{reviewCont}, REVIEW_POINT=#{reviewPoint}, REVIEW_DATE = sysdate WHERE REVIEW_NUM=#{reviewNum}
mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_TITLE, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONT, REVIEW_POINT FROM BOOK B, (SELECT * FROM REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC) R WHERE B.ISBN=R.ISBN AND R.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ROWNUM<=3
